name: english-learning-extension
description: Chrome extension for learning English by selecting words and building vocabulary diary

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run copy-assets
scripts.bundle: esbuild src/content.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content.js --format=iife && esbuild src/background.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/background.js --format=iife && esbuild src/popup.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/popup.js --format=iife && esbuild src/recall-page.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/recall-page.js --format=iife && esbuild src/settings.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/settings.js --format=iife
scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); ['manifest.json', 'popup', 'styles', 'icons'].forEach(f => { const src=path.join(__dirname, f); const dest=path.join(__dirname, 'dist', f); if(fs.existsSync(src)){ if(fs.lstatSync(src).isDirectory()){ fs.cpSync(src, dest, {recursive: true}); } else { fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); } } });"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const dist=path.join(__dirname, 'dist'); if(fs.existsSync(dist)){ fs.rmSync(dist, {recursive: true}); }"
